All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

H

handleAddEmployee() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "Add" button of the employee tab, it checks the validity of the various fields and in case of failure is managed through alerts, instead if the method is successful it adds the new employee in the empList and prints it in the table of the graphical interface.
handleAddProd() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "Add" button of the "add product" tab, it checks the validity of the various fields if the method fails it is managed through alerts, instead if the method succeeds it adds the new product and updates the list and the corresponding tableview.
handleBuy() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.ClientController
This method is used by the button "buy", to order a product to the client, in case of success the order will be saved in the cart of the same client and in case of failure the result is managed through alerts.
handleChoiceClient() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.EmployeeController
This method is used to print in the combobox choiceClient the list of clients who have made at least one order.
handleContactUsLink() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.LoginController
This method is used to handle the contact us button.
handleHomeButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.Controller
This method is used to manage the login button in the Register.fxml file registration scene.
handleLoginButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.LoginController
This method is used to handle the login button.
handleRefreshAddTable() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "Add product" tab and prints the updated product table.
handleRefreshRmvTable() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "Remove product" tab and prints the updated product table.
handleRefreshUpdateTable() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "Update product" tab and prints the updated product table.
handleRmvEmp() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "remove" button of the "employees" tab, it checks if the employee username exists and if so it deletes the account related to that username, updating the related list of employees and table.
handleRmvProd() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "Remove" button of the "remove product" tab, it checks if the inserted id is valid and if so it deletes the product, updating the relative list and table.
handleSearch() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.ClientController
This method is used by the search button of the Client.fxml, to search for the various products that match the passed parameters; it comes also used the method searchProduct that is found in the Client class.
handleSendAll() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.EmployeeController
This method is used by the "Send All" button to confirm the order of a single client and subsequently update the various lists and tableviews.
handleSignIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.RegisterController
This method is used to sign up a new user, it sends you an alert message if username or password are exists.
handleUpdate() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.AdminController
This method is used by the "update" button of the "update product" tab, it checks if the id and the quantity inserted is valid and if so it updates the product, updating the relative list and table.
handleUpdate() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.EmployeeController
This method is used by the update buttons found in Admin.fxml and Employee.fxml to update the quantity of the selected product.
handleView() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.ClientController
This method is used by the "View All" button, to print in the table all the products present in the store.
handleViewBuyElDev() - Method in class assegnamento2.assegnamento2.controller.EmployeeController
This method is used to print the list of products that have run out of stock in the graphical interface.
